title: 324 61 "Wanted Posters Make It Around the World! Celebrations in Their Hometowns as the Ship Moves Forward!"Transliteration: "Meguru Tehaisho! Kokyō wa Odoru Fune wa Susumu!" (Japanese:めぐる手配書! 故郷は踊る 船は進む!) Tetsuya Endō Koga Naoki September 16, 2007(2007-09-16)[71] November 22, 2015
transformers_text: 324 61 Wanted Posters Make It Around the World Celebrations in Their Hometowns as the Ship Moves Forward Transliteration Me guru Teh a is ho Kok y wa Odor u Fun e wa Susumu Japanese Tetsuya End Koga Naoki September 16 2007 2007 09 16 71 November 22 2015 With the crew back together the Straw Hats focus their efforts on escaping while agreeing to use the name that Iceberg suggested the Thousand Sunny Franky goes to the engine room to activate one of its special abilities while Luffy says goodbyes to his grandfather Ko by and everyone on Water 7 Nerv io us and enraged by his grandson's audacity Gar p takes out his gigantic iron ball and chain to sink the Straw Hats Luckily the Sunny's emergency acceleration device activates and blasts the ship a kilometer away beyond Gar p's reach Some time later life resumes on Water 7 as Kok oro returns to her station while Iceberg offers the Franky Family a job at Galley La Meanwhile as the crew celebrate while preparing to head towards Fish man Island their wanted posters circulate around the world Everyone in their hometowns Bara tie A la bast a and Smoker have heard about the crew's deeds at Eni es Lobby The posters even reach the Revolutionary Army with their leader Dragon impressed and confident he and Luffy will cross paths in the future as father and son
